item.title: Going off-heap to improve latency and reduce AWS bill
item.description: <img src="/img/2017/02/java_logo_2b.png" alt="java_logo_2b"> Great read - shows you the power of Java and Chronicle Map. Describing how going off-heap with the help of Chronicle Map helped us to get rid of the latency hiccups and cut our Amazon AWS bill in half. Source: Going off-heap to improve latency and reduce AWS bill â€“ Plumbr Caution: Before you go diving into using the open source version of Chronicle Map, there are some gotchas to be aware of from a features point-of-view.
